trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems> event occurs when a new area of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> in virtual mode is exposed and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> determines a new range of items is needed.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified starting and ending indices.

The starting index of a range of items needed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> for the next <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"></xref> event that occurs.

The ending index of a range of items needed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> for the next <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"></xref> event that occurs.
Gets the ending index for the range of values needed by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control in virtual mode.

The range of values specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.StartIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.EndIndex%2A> properties represents the range of values most likely needed by a virtual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control for the next occurrence of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event.
The index at the end of the range of values needed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
Gets the starting index for a range of values needed by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control in virtual mode.

The range of values specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.StartIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.EndIndex%2A> properties represents the range of values most likely needed by a virtual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control for the next occurrence of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event.
The index at the start of the range of values needed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
